			"status": "added",
			"newValue": "blah blah"

			"newValue": {
				"key5": "value5"
			}
		},

			"status": "unchanged",
			"doge": {
				"status": "unchanged",
				"wow": {
					"status": "modified",
					"value": "",
					"newValue": "so much"
				}
			},
			"key": {
				"status": "unchanged",
				"value": "value"
			},
			"ops": {
				"status": "added",
				"newValue": "vops"
			}
		}
	},

		"status": "unchanged",
		"baz": {
			"status": "modified",
			"value": "bas",
			"newValue": "bars"
		},
		"foo": {
			"status": "unchanged",
			"value": "bar"
		},
		"nest": {
			"status": "modified",
			"value": {
				"key": "value"
			},
			"newValue": "str"
		}
	},
	"group2": {
		"status": "deleted",
		"value": {
			"abc": 12345,
			"deep": {
				"id": 45
			}
		}
	},
	"group3": {
		"status": "added",
		"newValue": {
			"deep": {
				"id": {
					"number": 45
				}
			},

		}
	}
